1.title: Closing Time
1.plot: Jedediah Harr is shipping off to the Coast Guard, but before he reports for duty he plans to live it up. He crosses paths with a young man fighting dark demons. Days later, Jedediah and his friend Brian Marquis find themselves in a frightening showdown.

2.title: Terror in the Woods
2.plot: A weekend of deer hunting in northern Wisconsin - usually a time of camaraderie and celebration - turns terrifying when, in less than 48 hours, an altercation between hunters in the woods leads to murder.

3.title: Game Over
3.plot: Retired Naval Commander, Danny Palm, takes action when a local drug-addict menaces the community with his El Camino. The violence that follows shatters the peaceful neighborhood forever.

4.title: Deadly Genius
4.plot: Dr. Amy Bishop has been denied tenure and will soon be losing her job when Dr. Gopi Podila invites her to an upcoming faculty meeting. Her history of outbursts and violent anger leads her department into danger no one could have expected.

5.title: Deadly Conviction
5.plot: Wichita, Kansas native George Tiller is one of four third trimester abortion providers in the country. Scott Roeder is an anti-abortion protestor. In 2009, a battle of convictions that starts in court will end in a bloody act of unspeakable violence.

6.title: Killer View
6.plot: Barry James and Jonathon Edington are Connecticut neighbors, tending the families they love. But when one man's darkest fears are awakened, love of family will pit one neighbor against the other.

7.title: Deadly Delivery
7.plot: 20-year-old Tariq Khamisa is a student at San Diego State University. Across town, Tony Hicks is a 14-year-old eighth grader who's fallen in with a dangerous crowd. Fate brings these two strangers together for a few shocking and tragic moments.

8.title: Road Kill
8.plot: Retired Naval Commander, Danny Palm, takes action when a local drug-addict menaces the community with his El Camino. The violence that follows shatters the peaceful neighborhood forever.

9.title: Trained to Kill
9.plot: Gene Yazgur loves rock climbing, but life hasn't always been so fun. Years earlier, Gene got into a road rage incident with medical student Daniel Mason. When the two men reunite in court tempers flare leading one of them to reach his breaking point.

10.title: Lethal Injustice
10.plot: Jeff Conroy is a student athlete, Marcelo Lucero a hard-working immigrant. Living just miles apart, they've never met...until Conroy and pals go looking for Hispanics to beat up. Down by the train station, the sport of "beaner hopping" turns deadly.

11.title: Killer Swing
11.plot: 27 year old Vincent Chin is enjoying a night out at the strip club before his wedding day. But he soon gets in a fight with two other patrons. A volatile mixture of booze and racial friction will soon explode into a deadly confrontation.

12.title: Blood Mountain Murder
12.plot: On New Year's Day 2008, then 24-year-old Meredith Emerson left her home with her dog Ella for a day long hike in the mountains of the Chattahoochee National Forest 90 miles north of Atlanta, Georgia. She failed to return home that evening. Investigators discovered her car, a dog leash, and water bottle the first day of the search. On Friday, January 4, 2008 police questioned Gary Michael Hilton outside a convenience store as a "person of interest" in the disappearance and served a warrant to search his van and a dumpster outside the convenience store. There, they ...

13.title: Murder on Music Row
13.plot: Kevin Hughes studies music business at Belmont College when Tony D'Antonio recruits him as an intern at CashBox magazine. After Kevin notices the less than glamorous side of the music industry, he vows to end the bribes that corrupt the music charts.

1.title: A Mother's Nightmare
1.plot: Fate intrudes when a nine month pregnant woman is lured to the home of a deeply troubled young woman with a secret plan to steal her fetus. In less than 24 hours, the expecting mom will be forced to fight for her life and the life of her unborn baby.

2.title: Good Cop, Bad Cop
2.plot: Two New Orleans police officers work side jobs at the same restaurant. As their lives intertwine, their relationship turns hostile. One of them will unleash a murderous rampage that will bring the entire Crescent City to its knees.

3.title: The Sausage King
3.plot: Stuart Alexander fights to save his family's 80 year old sausage plant while Jean Hillery fights to prove herself as a newly-promoted USDA officer. When Jean threatens to shut down the factory for health violations the two collide in a deadly face off.

4.title: Fatal Voyage
4.plot: In 2007, young and beautiful Kelly Branam decides to join her husband Jake, a charter boat captain, on one of his trips. For Jake and Kelly it should be a simple excursion: ferry a well-heeled businessman, Guillermo Zarabozo and his partner, one-way from Miami Beach to Bimini. As they cast off, Kelly gets a strange, uneasy feeling about Mr. Zarabozo and his friend. Captain Jake should have checked their passports and looked inside their luggage. Halfway across the Gulf Stream Kelly and Jake realize too late that these two men are not who they say they are.

5.title: A Killer Night in Brooklyn
5.plot: 19 year old Mark Fisher is bar hopping in NYC when he leaves his buddies and takes up with a new group. His new acquaintenes take him to an afterhours party where he becomes the target of a gang initiation that could cost him his life.

6.title: Deadly Deeds
6.plot: Genore Guillory has been helping her struggling neighbors with paid work and financial support, even naming them as beneficiaries on her life insurance policy. But one neighbor is in a white supremacist gang with plans to unload its racist fury her.

7.title: Wicked
7.plot: Joel Leyva is a 52-year-old family man and devout Christian. Angela Sanford is a 30-year-old social outcast and practicing Wiccan. After meeting at a racetrack, they develop an unlikely friendship ending in a mysterious murder.

8.title: Deadly ID
8.plot: A group of hard-partying young men meet an alluring, young woman called "Lida" and two of the men separately become intimate with her. But "Lida" isn't who they think she is and when they uncover her deepest secret, violence erupts and shatters lives.

9.title: Who Shot the Sheriff
9.plot: Federal agents suspect beloved podiatrist Ron Mikos of massive Medicare fraud. Their star witness is Mikos patient Joyce Brannon, a retired nurse. With a grand jury date just days away, the doctor and the nurse are hurtling toward a deadly face-off.

10.title: Fueled by Hate
10.plot: Life couldn't be better for Pam Waechter, she has close family nearby and a job she loves. But through a series of untimely events, she crosses paths with a disturbed young man named Naveed Haq, and explosive violence results.

11.title: Living on the Edge
11.plot: Stephen Hill and Tom Dong meet while struggling to make a name for themselves as actors in the adult film industry. Tom finally finds his way behind the camera while Stephen's career falters. Their friendship unravels with deadly consequences.

2.title: Stuck in the Middle
2.plot: Dog lover Michael Hurlbutt becomes friendly with a local breeder...too friendly, in the eyes of her soon-to-be-ex-boyfriend Leonel Marquetti. As the urge to help tangles with an angry insecurity, this three-way relationship is about to turn deadly.

3.title: A Brother's Debt
3.plot: Fifteen year old Nick Markowitz lives in a secure, affluent suburb. He's a good kid, rarely in trouble. One sunny morning he's out walking when young marijuana dealer Jesse James Hollywood drives by with two friends. Unknown to Nick, Hollywood is in an escalating clash with Nick's older brother Ben over a $1200 debt. Hollywood acts on sudden impulse and stops their van. They beat, grab, then drive Nick 75 miles north. Across the next three days, Nick and Hollywood's fateful crossing ignites a chain of events that will end in tragedy.

4.title: The Road to Hell
4.plot: 52 year old Ray Patterson is a tow truck driver in Dyersburg, TN. When he sets out to aid a motorist in need, he runs into Steven Ray Thacker - a cold-blooded killer on the run who's prepared to do anything to continue to elude police.

5.title: Fatal Fantasy
5.plot: Robert Schwartz is a respected DNA scientist in Virginia. His relationship with his 19-year-old daughter, Clara Jane, has never been easy, but since she's been away at college, the hostility between them has deepened. Recently, she's met a young man named Kyle Hulbert, who shares her obsession with magic and the occult. Each spends hours in a fantasy world peopled by sorcerers and demons. Soon Clara tells Kyle her father wants to kill her and her new friend starts to believe her. In the end, one of these three people will be dead, and other two in prison for murder.

6.title: Murder Around the Campfire
6.plot: When 33 year-old Sean Farmer and his friend Scott plan a fishing trip into the woods of southwest Virginia, they could never dream that, in less than 2 days, they will face a violent and bloody struggle for their lives.

7.title: The Ring
7.plot: 55 year-old Joan Loughman finds the perfect retirement home for her aging father, and the center's Marketing Director promises to make the difficult process go smoothly. But the trusting relationship they develop is shattered by violence.

8.title: American Nightmare
8.plot: In summer 2001, 27 year old Bangladeshi immigrant Rais Bhuiyan is working at a gas station in Dallas, where he has come to seek his fortune. Nearby, Mark Stroman is an angry ex-con with racist views who has been drifting from job to job, bragging about robbing small businesses. After the terrorist attacks of September 11, 2001, Mark's anger reaches a boiling point and triggers a violent plot for revenge. In less than 3 days, that plan will bring him to Rais Bhuiyan's door, forcing Rais to fight for his life and the American Dream he so deeply believes in.

9.title: Art Imitates Death
9.plot: 20 year-old Shelley Nance is a talented artist. When she falls for a fellow art student, she has no idea that their innocent relationship will trigger a jealous rage that will lead to a brutal killing.

10.title: Episode #2.10
10.plot: A lonely woman named Cynthia Lynch finds friendship in a Louisiana-based hate group headed by Raymond Foster. But during her initiation into the group things spiral out of control and Cynthia suddenly becomes desperate to escape.

11.title: Road to Hell
11.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

12.title: White Hot Rage
12.plot: KKK splinter group, the Sons of Dixie, kill Oklahoma woman during initiation dispute when she tried to back out.

13.title: In His Father's Eyes
13.plot: A home inspection in a Texas town turns bad as housing code enforcer Michael "Pee Wee" Walker and 22 year old Adam Ward clash over rights and wrongs. A clash that sets both men and their devoted fathers on a collision course that ends in a deadly tragedy.

14.title: Shot in the Foot
14.plot: Federal agents suspect beloved podiatrist Ron Mikos of massive Medicare fraud. Their star witness is Mikos patient Joyce Brannon, a retired nurse. With a grand jury date just days away, the doctor and the nurse are hurtling toward a deadly face-off.

15.title: Not a Routine Call
15.plot: A veteran cop is dispatched to pick up a paranoid schizophrenic and bring him to the hospital for a routine mental evaluation. Little does the cop know, the man has already shot and killed three people. A violent showdown ensues.

16.title: A Deadly Fix
16.plot: When a Seattle resident decides to buy an old home to renovate and flip, he hires a local homeless man named Richard Jones. It looks like the perfect arrangement, at first. But this fixer upper will spark a murderous plot.

-1.title: Trained to Kill
-1.plot: Gene Yazgur loves rock climbing, but life hasn't always been so fun. Years earlier, Gene got into a road rage incident with medical student Daniel Mason. When the two men reunite in court tempers flare leading one of them to reach his breaking point.

imdb.title: Fatal Encounters
plot: Reenactments that traces the doomed relationships between victim and killer as their paths intertwine, setting the stage for a series of events that lead to murder.::Anonymous
